choices.D: All A, B, C are correct

text: The contract is one of the grounds giving rise to an obligation, right or wrong?

choices.D: Contract of Unilateral Legal Conduct and Other Grounds

text: Which of the following situations may restrict access to information?

choices.C: For the benefit of the citizens.
choices.D: For reasons of national defense and security.

choices.B: From half a year to a year

choices.B: Fake and false information about products, goods, money, bonds, bills, bonds, checks and other valuable papers
choices.C: Propaganda information that distorts and defames the people's government

text: Fertilizers circulating on the market must be labeled according to the provisions of the law on goods labels and what content must be included in the fertilizer label? Choose the best answer.

choices.C: Both A and B are correct.
choices.D: Both A and B are false.

text: In case a person comes to stay at 10pm, when will the stay notification be made?

choices.C: Where the law selected by the parties in the labor contract or the consumer contract affects the minimum rights of employees and consumers according to the provisions of Vietnamese law

choices.C: Interrogation of the General Secretary of the Communist Party of Vietnam

choices.C: The alimony or supportee dies or the party receiving the support after the divorce is married.
